results.title: New insights on the potential anti-epileptic effect of metformin: Mechanistic pathway
results.text_hl: Nevertheless, the underlying mechanism of the anti-@<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizure@@@ activity of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was not entirely clarified.

results.title: Tuberous Sclerosis, Type II Diabetes Mellitus and the PI3K/AKT/mTOR Signaling Pathways:Case Report and Literature Review
results.text_hl: Some studies have found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ does not reduce @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ volume or @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizure@@@ frequency when compared to a placebo, while other studies have found that it does.

results.text_hl: Recent studies have shown that statins and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ may have beneficial effects on @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizure@@@ through different mechanisms.

results.title: A review on role of metformin as a potential drug for epilepsy treatment and modulation of epileptogenesis.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: This review found the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in different @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizure@@@ models including genetic knockout model, chemical induced, and kindling models.

results.title: Evaluation of the ameliorative effects of oral administration of metformin on epileptogenesis in the temporal lobe epilepsy model in rats.
results.text_hl: Recently, it has been postulated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, an old antidiabetic oral drug, has anti-@<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizure@@@ properties mostly due to its antioxidant activities.
